sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"使人不安或烦恼"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: bother, disturb, trouble, annoy, irritate, vex
means: bother ： 指使人烦恼而引起的紧张不安或感到不耐烦。
disturb ： 较正式用词，多用被动态。指拢乱，使人不能平静或妨碍别人工作、思维或正常秩序，是程度较深的烦恼。
trouble ： 指给人在行动上带来不便或在身心上造成痛苦。
annoy ： 强调因被迫忍受令人不快、讨厌的事而失去平静或耐心，多指一时的打拢或恼怒。
irritate ： 语气比annoy强得多，指激怒，使发怒，多指一种短时间的反应。
vex ： 侧重指因不断的干扰而引起的烦恼，有时含激怒的意味。

sentence.Network_en: As the years went by his nastiness began to annoy his readers.
sentence.Network_cn: 年深日久，他恶毒的文字开始让读者生厌。

sentence.Network_en: Try making a note of the things which annoy you.
His constant joking was beginning to annoy her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不停地开玩笑，已开始惹她生气。

list.abs: 利用人的五官套在水果上，打造出「烦人的橘子」(Annoying Orange)短片，并利用社群网站打造出百万的点阅率。(画面翻摄自网路) …
...　排名4至10位的是：YouTube上的动画明星“烦人橘子(Annoying Orange)”、男用香水“Old Spice”的广告猛男、一个看到双重彩虹而 …
annoying和boring的区别_百度知道 ... Very annoying 很讨厌 How annoying 真可恶啊；多气人 Annoying Dove 讨人厌的鸽子.
中考英语复习资料_百度知道 ... *get an education 受教育 *get annoyed 变得气恼 *get indured 受伤.
另外，年轻人还用 jerk 这个字，通常是指没有社交技巧，头脑简单或古怪，令人讨厌的家伙(annoying person)，如果你不喜欢一个人…

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (in the sense 'be hateful to'): from Old French anoier (verb), anoi (noun), based on Latin in odio in the phrase mihi in odio est 'it is hateful to me'

entry.tran: 使生气；使不耐烦；使烦恼
entry.def: If someone or something annoys you, it makes you fairly angry and impatient.

example.ex: Try making a note of the things which annoy you...
It annoyed me that I didn't have time to do more reading...
example.tran: 腾不出时间多看会儿书让我很烦。

means.word_mean: 1. cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations;

sentences.sentence: "Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me"
"It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves"

auth_sentence.content: Local police chiefs who annoy them are simply killed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Local police chiefs who annoy them are simply killed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Local police chiefs who annoy them are simply killed.

auth_sentence.content: He wasn't trying to insult him but to annoy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wasn't trying to insult him but to annoy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wasn't trying to insult him but to annoy.

auth_sentence.content: She doesn't know behaviour will annoy you.
auth_sentence.res_content: She doesn't know behaviour will annoy you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She doesn't know behaviour will annoy you.

Sentence.sentence: What happened in a drug store that greatly annoyed the speaker?
The most annoying thing though, is the way employees watched my friends and me.

sentences.en: He was annoyed to learn that the train would be delayed.
sentences.cn: 他听说火车要晚点, 心里感到烦恼。

sentences.en: He was annoyed that we had one of his cushions.
sentences.cn: 我们用了他的一个坐垫, 他很生气。

jushi.english: Stop annoying me and do leave.
Please go away and stop annoying me!
What annoys me is the way he won't even listen to other people's suggestions.
jushi.chinese: 令我生气的是，他对别人的建议连都听不愿听。
